channel.title: Login with client with LAN dator
channel.description: When i hoing too log in with the same client i have in my other acc i cant log in, i downloaded a client and with the computer where i have my server the client itss working but not in my other how can i make a client where everyone can come in?

item.title: Login with client with LAN dator
item.dc:creator: @david760 david760
item.description:
@david760 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Hosting computer uses localhost.
Other computers on your network use the IPv4 address.

Other people use the No-IP address.[/quote]

When i log in with my hosting computer i dont joining the other hosted computer …

Read full topic

item.title: Login with client with LAN dator
item.dc:creator: @david760 david760
item.description:
@david760 wrote:

I Vain I:

Port-forward.

Portforward? i have portforward my computers… thats not the problem problem is i want to log in to same server with same client with both computers so we playing together in internet.
